attributes.action: Play the National Anthem at all football fixtures
attributes.additional_details:
In the USA they play their national anthem at all levels, including school sports events

Great Britain should be equally as proud and patriotic, and football matches are a great opportunity to demonstrate that
attributes.background:
Currently the National Anthem is only played at major football fixtures (internationals and FA Cup final, as an example)

As football is our national sport it should be played at all tiers of football from the Premier League down to the National League North and South

rejection.details: Decisions about playing the national anthem at football fixtures are for individual football clubs and stadiums, not the UK Government or Parliament.
